extendedInfo.description: Fox Valley IL Deals brings you savings from 50-90% off the best stuff to do, see, eat and buy. Download the Fox Valley IL Deals app to get fresh deals sent directly to your Android Phone when they become available. Whether you are looking for a new restaurant, a great salon, a concert event or a local attraction, check out Fox Valley IL Deals for great savings! With the Fox Valley IL Deals app you can: - Buy and redeem your Fox Valley IL Deals voucher directly from your phone - Yes, you can save ink! - Browse and Search local and national deals - View the business details including locations - Track your purchased Fox Valley IL Deals vouchers, including gifts given and/or received - Update your profile settings, view your site credit bucks, add/remove subscriptions
